summary: 2001 MAZDA TRIBUTE, DIED WHILE DRIVING AT 35 MILES PER HOUR.  NO BREAKS, NO STEERING, NO CONTROL.  THIS IS THE 3RD TIME AND CLEARLY THE MOST DANGEROUS AS IT WAS LIFE THREATENING.  MAZDA IS UNRESPONSIVE AND NOT HONORING MY BUY BACK REQUEST.  THEY SAID THE PROBLEM HAS BEEN FIXED, BUT THEY SAID THEY FIXED IT PREVIOUSLY AND IT WASN'T SO I HAVE NO FAITH I AM NOT WILLING TO RISK MY LIFE AGAIN.  WHY HASN'T THERE BEEN A RECALL?  I HAVE SEEN DOZEN OF OTHERS WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  *JB
